Aun Tiulerea tells you, "Would you like to hunt them as well? Very well, scour this region and others like it and I am sure you will find the golem. Kill five of these golems, return to me and I will see that your battles are rewarded!"
Thanks Baebarri.

location.name: Aun Autuorea
location.description:
Quest(s): Aun Golem Hunters.
Aun Autuorea tells you, Greetings. I am Aun Autuorea. My brothers and I have left Palenqual to hunt! I have chosen to challenge myself by hunting the Magma Golem Exarch as my prey.
Thanks Mr Fizz of Leafcull.

location.name: Aun Aukherea
location.description:
Quest(s): Aun Golem Hunters.
Aun Aukherea tells you, "Greetings. I am Aun Aukherea. My twin, Khekie, and I have come to Ayan Baqur to hunt the Golem Lords. I am not quite as brazen as Khekie, so I have chosen to stalk the western borders of this land in search of the Coral Golem Viceroy."
Aun Aukherea tells you, "Would you like to hunt them as well? Very well, scour this region and others like it and I am sure you will find the golem. Kill five of these golems, return to me and I will see that your battles are rewarded!"
Thanks Azif TD.

location.name: Aun Khekierea
location.description:
Quest(s): Aun Golem Hunters.
Aun Khekierea tells you, Greetings. I am Aun Khekierea. I have come to this city with my twin, Aukhe, to hunt the golem lords! While Aukhe has chosen to seek out the Coral Viceroys, I am hunting the most dangerous of the Golem Lords! The Platinum Golem Mountain King...
Thanks Azif TD.

location.name: Akyafi ibn Sumwar
location.description:
Quest(s): Search for Abmim ibn Ibsar and Mad Star Investigation.
Akyafi the Translator stands on the top of the tavern in Yaraq.
Akyafi ibn Sumwar tells you, "I am a humble scholar from Zaikhal. Of late, we have heard of the unusually large number of Drudges in the hills around the Yaraq Cove."
Akyafi ibn Sumwar tells you, "They seem to gather near the ruin of the Empyrean port on the far side of the cove, where the Mad Star flickers. Perhaps you could investigate, and bring me back something which would explain their presence?"
Akyafi ibn Sumwar tells you, "I recently sent young Abmim to investigate, but he has not yet returned."
Akyafi ibn Sumwar tells you, "If you are having difficulty locating the Mad Star, you may buy directions from the barkeeper, Jubal. He's afraid of the Mad Star; ask him instead how to reach the Pillars of the Inner Sea."

location.name: Guard Ellyon
location.description:
Quest(s): Clutch Of Kings.
The rewards that I grant are meant for those that have fought through all six of the Burun Kings. When you have done so return to me. If you choose, combine the scraps of flesh that you collect from the Kings and combine them one after the other. When all six are together hand it to me for a fair reward."

location.name: Guard Fassel
location.description:
Quest(s): Clutch Of Kings.
The rewards that I grant are meant for those that have fought through all six of the Burun Kings. When you have done so return to me. If you choose, combine the scraps of flesh that you collect from the Kings and combine them one after the other. When all six are together hand it to me for a fair reward."

location.name: Guard Hamdyn
location.description:
Quest(s): Clutch Of Kings.
The rewards that I grant are meant for those that have fought through all six of the Burun Kings. When you have done so return to me. If you choose, combine the scraps of flesh that you collect from the Kings and combine them one after the other. When all six are together hand it to me for a fair reward."

location.name: Guard Sorchia
location.description:
Quest(s): Clutch Of Kings.
The rewards that I grant are meant for those that have fought through all six of the Burun Kings. When you have done so return to me. If you choose, combine the scraps of flesh that you collect from the Kings and combine them one after the other. When all six are together hand it to me for a fair reward."

location.name: Guard Lo Pan
location.description:
Quest(s): Clutch Of Kings.
The rewards that I grant are meant for those that have fought through all six of the Burun Kings. When you have done so return to me. If you choose, combine the scraps of flesh that you collect from the Kings and combine them one after the other. When all six are together hand it to me for a fair reward."

location.name: Guard Haigh
location.description:
Quest(s): Clutch Of Kings.
The rewards that I grant are meant for those that have fought through all six of the Burun Kings. When you have done so return to me. If you choose, combine the scraps of flesh that you collect from the Kings and combine them one after the other. When all six are together hand it to me for a fair reward."

location.name: Guard Devon
location.description:
Quest(s): Clutch Of Kings.
The rewards that I grant are meant for those that have fought through all six of the Burun Kings. When you have done so return to me. If you choose, combine the scraps of flesh that you collect from the Kings and combine them one after the other. When all six are together hand it to me for a fair reward."

location.name: Aun Arenura the Crafter
location.description:
Quest(s): Siraluun Dresses (Marsh, Tidal, Littoral, Timber).
Aun Arenura the Crafter tells you, "Greetings! My father, Aun Whethura in Timaru has tasked me with helping the younger members of the xuta, Ispar. He says that we can both learn much from each other."
Aun Arenura the Crafter tells you, "My father's fondness for the Siraluun has also rubbed off onto me. Should you find any trophies, such as Siraluun Feathers or Claws, I will gladly take them and reward you with a weapon."
Aun Arenura the Crafter tells you, "Also, I am learning the art of tailoring as well. If you should bring me this bag..."
Aun Arenura the Crafter gives you Embroidered Bag.
Aun Arenura the Crafter tells you, "...full of feathers, I will craft you a gown of feathers. I should warn you though. I am not skilled enough, nor am I worthy of working with the feathers of the more powerful Siraluun. You should bring those feathers to my father in Timaru."
Aun Arenura the Crafter tells you, "One final note, unlike my father and the others who reside within the walls of Timaru, I bear no grudges to those who may have acted against the Tonk. My father would say that I am foolish for this belief."

location.name: Aun Kahuiura
location.description:
Quest(s): Siraluun Claw Crafters.
The recent rise of arts and crafts on the land of your xuta has inspired my siblings and I to take up the noble practice of the fine arts ourselves. My name is Kahuiura, Aun Artisan in Arcane Ointment.
After September 2005
Aun Kahuiura tells you, Despite the occupation of these invaders, my siblings and I continue to practice our skills in arts and crafts. My name is Kahuiura, Aun Artisan in Arcane Ointment.

location.name: Aun Ihmenaura
location.description:
Quest(s): Siraluun Claw Crafters.
The recent rise of arts and crafts on the land of your xuta has inspired my siblings and I to take up the noble practice of the fine arts ourselves. My name is Ihmenaura, Aun Artisan in Feather and Claw.
After September 2005
Aun Ihmenaura tells you, Despite the occupation of these invaders, my siblings and I continue to practice our skills in arts and crafts. My name is Ihmenaura, Aun Artisan in Feather and Claw.

location.name: Aun Pitamaura
location.description:
Quest(s): Siraluun Claw Crafters.
The recent rise of arts and crafts on the land of your xuta has inspired my siblings and I to take up the noble practice of the fine arts ourselves. My name is Pitamaura, Aun Artisan in Spike and Blade.
After September 2005
Aun Pitamaura tells you, Despite the occupation of these invaders, my siblings and I continue to practice our skills in arts and crafts. My name is Pitamaura, Aun Artisan in Spike and Blade.

location.name: Aun Nireeura
location.description:
Quest(s): Siraluun Claw Crafters.
The recent rise of arts and crafts on the land of your xuta has inspired my siblings and I to take up the noble practice of the fine arts ourselves. My name is Nireeura, Aun Artisan in Pin and Pitch.
After September 2005
Aun Nireeura tells you, Despite the occupation of these invaders, my siblings and I continue to practice our skills in arts and crafts. My name is Nireeura, Aun Artisan in Pin and Pitch.

location.name: Vincadi
location.description:
Quest(s): Harbinger.
Vincadi tells you, "You have the mark of Nuhmudira upon you. Were I not enamored with the interactions of your race and deciphering the rationale behind your choices, I would likely remove your flesh one layer at a time for this affront."
Vincadi is the NPC to whom you give the Broken Virindi Consul and Broken Virindi Desecrator Masks.
You give Vincadi Broken Virindi Desecrator Mask.
Vincadi tells you, "How did you obtain this artifact? Well, no matter. It can be repaired and used."

location.name: Dionaea
location.description:
Quest(s): House Plants.
Dionaea tells you, "If you bring me five of the red monster seeds, I will do my best to cultivate one of them for you. Then you can have your very own Fly Trap!"

location.name: Drozer
location.description:
Quest(s): House Plants.
Drozer tells you, "If you bring me five of the orange monster seeds, I will do my best to cultivate one of them for you. Then you can have your very own Sundew!

location.name: Sara Sen
location.description:
Quest(s): House Plants.
Sara Sen tells you, "If you bring me five of the yellow monster seeds, I will do my best to cultivate one of them for you. Then you can have your very own Pitcher Plant!".

location.name: Farmer Kao
location.description:
Quest(s): Farmer Kao's Plea for Help.
Farmer Kao tells you, My crops! My livestock! Some vile creature has been ravaging my farm at night! Would you help me stop this terror? I have followed its tracks to a cave south of here, but I am too afraid to continue. Please help me.

location.name: Collector
location.description: Collector tells you, "I'm interested in monster trophies from many of the monsters that plague Dereth. If you give me such items, I will reward you with money or an item. With regret, I don't deal in hides."

location.name: Leather Crafter (Rithwic)
location.description: If you give me the hide of an armoredillo, gromnie, reedshark, or mattekar, I can make something with it that you may find useful.

location.name: Leather Crafter (Tou-Tou)
location.description: If you give me the hide of an armoredillo, gromnie, reedshark, or mattekar, I can make something with it that you may find useful.

location.name: Obsidian Enchantress (Holtburg)
location.description: Obsidian Enchanters craft items from Obsidian Jewels and Obsidian Spheres. Each NPC gives a different reward.

location.name: Obsidian Enchanter (Samsur)
location.description: Obsidian Enchanters craft items from Obsidian Jewels and Obsidian Spheres. Each NPC gives a different reward.

location.name: Obsidian Enchantress (Hebian-To)
location.description: Obsidian Enchanters craft items from Obsidian Jewels and Obsidian Spheres. Each NPC gives a different reward.

location.name: Lilly of Glenden Wood
location.description:
Quest(s): Lady Aerfalle Quest, Sword of Lost Light Quest.
Lilly of Glenden Wood tells you, "I use Auroch horns in the making of my potions. I discovered how to use Mattekar horns to produce health elixirs and Sunflowers to make Sunflower oil."
Lilly of Glenden Wood tells you, "If you give me a horn, I'll give you some of my potion in return. If you give me a Sunflower I'll give you some Sunflower oil."

location.name: Neydisa Castle Ivory Crafter
location.description: The entrance to the tower this crafter lives in can only be opened by entering the center of the nearby stone circle (69.6n, 16.5e). Be wary of the woodgolem that guards the tower door as well as the etheral wisps that occupy the circle.

location.name: Leather Crafter (Rithwic)
location.description:
Watch her chimney! It belches fire - most strange...
If you give me the hide of an armoredillo, gromnie, reedshark, or mattekar, I can make something with it that you may find useful.

location.name: North Desert Edge Peddler
location.description:
This vendor deals in misc. odds and ends. Its a fair spot to stop if you're in need of basic supplies but not worth a special trip.
There's also a decent sized population of reedsharks, water and mud golems, and the occasional blue wasps about, making this isolated vendor a fairly safe place to hunt.

location.name: Fadsahil al-Tashbi
location.description: Fadsahil al-Tashbi the Master Archmage tells you, Greetings. I am glad that you have taken time to visit me here. Yes, I have recently moved to this new area, there have been some odd happenings within my former residence as of late.

location.name: Master Celdiseth the Archmage
location.description:
Sells at 110%, buys at 80%. Platinum Scarabs 44,000py.
Master Celdiseth the Archmage tells you, "You are too kind, my friend."
Master Celdiseth the Archmage tells you, "A wise purchase."
Master Celdiseth the Archmage tells you, "You have traveled far...How can I serve thee?"
Master Celdiseth the Archmage tells you, "Have a safe and rewarding journey."

location.name: Ringoshu the Apple Seller
location.description:
Quest(s): Trothyr's Rest Key, Trothyr's Rest Rumor, Apple, Tart Apple. Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Ringoshu the Apple Seller tells you, Welcome! What's your pleasure today?.
Tart Apples.

location.name: Cabbage Farmer
location.description: Dansha-Ki grows his royal cabbages out here.

location.name: Woodland Peddler
location.description: This peddler has taken up residence in the remote wilderness. No one is sure exactly how much business he might do in this off the beaten path location.

location.name: Linvak Peddler
location.description: All alone in this small vale, this Sho Peddler stands ready to serve your basic equipment needs anytime, day or night.

location.name: Peddler (Sawato)
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.
This poor peddler has become completely lost, so she just set up camp and settled in for a bit. While the selection is very limited, you just may find that item you've been missing.

location.name: Healer (Sawato)
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.
This Sho Healer prefers to stay away from the bustle of town life, but still sells limited provisions of good quality.

location.name: Archmage
location.description: This lonely archmage obviously thought this would be a trade route at some point. Until then his rather large structure remains empty except for himself. He's set up several large braziers to help attract visitors but unfortunately his shop is woefully understocked to get much use.

location.name: Jolly Snowman
location.description: This jolly giant snowman sells one thing; Magic Iceballs. A rare and much sought after ingredient in many frosty recipes. But come prepared as the price is a bit steep.

location.name: Archmage and Peddler
location.description: These two lonely characters have only a meagre selection of goods. But then again they have the sunshine, the beach and the surf.

location.name: Igloo Archmage
location.description: This lonely soul sits in his igloo home on the hilltop. The success of this venture is obvious by the amount of stock he has on hand. Still, if you're in a pinch, he may have what you need. But not likely.

location.name: North Road Vendors
location.description: A wandering Bowyer and his compainion, an Archmage, have set up a modest shop along the road between the Bandit Castle and Neydisa Castle. They only carry the barest supplies, but their door is always open to welcome folks in from the Cold.

location.name: Gervena the Oblique
location.description:
Quest(s): Fenmalain Vestibule, Caulnalain Vestibule, Shendolain Vestibule.
Gervena the Oblique tells you, "I have heard of powerful gems, more powerful than the mediocre gems you bring to those so-called master smiths. If I had such a gem, I could make a powerful spell-casting orb with unique properties."
Gervena the Oblique tells you, "Of course, if you are not a masterful mage, you should speak with one of my younger brothers. If you have one of my old orbs, I will improve it for you."

location.name: Gerloc the Defender
location.description:
Quest(s): Fenmalain Vestibule, Caulnalain Vestibule, Shendolain Vestibule.
Gerloc the Defender tells you, "Greetings. My siblings and I traveled here seeking gems of great power. I hear that there are some master armorers who craft suits of armor from fused gems. Those are beneath my notice. Bring me something even more powerful than a scintillating gem, and I will craft a great and unique shield for you. If you have one of my old shields, I will improve it for you."

location.name: Gersan the Sureshot
location.description:
Quest(s): Fenmalain Vestibule, Caulnalain Vestibule, Shendolain Vestibule.
Gersan the Sureshot tells you, "If you can find a gem more powerful than a mere scintillating gem, I would be interested in it. Give me such a gem and I will use it to craft a magical bow for you. The bow will be so powerful, in fact, that normal ammunition will not work on it. You will have to come to me for arrowheads as well. If you have one my old missile weapons, I will improve it for you."
Gersan the Sureshot tells you, "I am not a crossbow maker, however, so if you need a crossbow you will have to attach a stock to the bow yourself."

location.name: Peddler
location.description:
Another peddler trying to make a living in this remote area.
Thanks go to Compton.

location.name: Farmer (Arwic)
location.description: This farmer tends the orchards to the west of his small house. He manages to help offset the damage the drudges and shreths in this area do to his crops by selling food to people using the lifestone nearby.

location.name: Farmer (Dryreach)
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Image and location submitted by Courier de Bois, Wintersebb

location.name: Northern Point Vendors
location.description: An archmage, a healer and a roaming bowyer... Not the beginning of a joke - these intrepid fellows make their sales in one bunker, while the other next door is taken by a mu-miyah. Such competition!

location.name: Mountain Shortcut Healer and Peddler
location.description:
Welcome! Welcome to our little outpost! What's your pleasure on this fine day? Perhaps some lockpicks, aye? Finest in the land, so they are!
You keep yourself safe out there. And stay away from the Bandit Castle! Since MacDugal's mob returned, it's been nothing but trouble between them and Tallial of Neydisa.

location.name: Nerezi ibn Risad
location.description:
Quest(s): Bestowers Guild of Dereth.
Nerezi ibn Risad tells you, "I sell instructions and puzzle pieces to applicants here at the Guild of Bestowers."

location.name: Naba Ko-Zin
location.description:
Quest(s): Bestowers Guild of Dereth.
Naba Ko-Zin tells you, "Have you come seeking instructions or puzzle pieces? I sell what you need for your examination at this branch of the Guild of Bestowers."
Naba Ko-Zin tells you, "Good Travels."

location.name: Riverside Vendors
location.description:
A healer and a mage share this lonely spot
Location and image submitted by Mira Coran. Thanks!

location.name: Garold's Gully Vendors
location.description:
Here be my late father Garold's old cabin. These days my sister the Archmage and her best friend the Roaming Bowyer (who doesn't seem to roam very much these days) are taking care of the land.
- Yhe of Wintersebb

location.name: West Coast Vendors
location.description:
Here, on a remote beach on the west shores of Dereth, these farmers eke out a meager existence. Things have gotten even worse since the September 2001 event, Keep Your Enemies Closer -- the area is surrounded by a wide variety of Dires spawn: Olthoi Soldiers, Harrower Grievers, Panumbris and Umbris Shadows, and other nasties! A nearby portal takes you to Plateau, just a stone's throw from Plateau Village.
Oh, and we may not forget to mention the Cow!

location.name: Southern Landbridge Vendors
location.description:
The Weaponsmith has a small set of wares, sells at 155% value, buys at 90%. Archmage also has as small selection: Scarabs up to silver, and only Tiny Mana Stones.
Note by Soulitaire: Coords will be re-checked!

location.name: Jubei's Apprentice
location.description:
Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.
A furniture vendor in Hebian-To.

location.name: Steiner's Apprentice
location.description: A furntiure vendor in Cragstone.

location.name: Jacque the Woodsman
location.description:
Quest(s): Housing.
Jacque the Woodsman tells you, "I have some treated wood that should burn extra hot for the winter." Jacque the Woodsman tells you, "The woods are really beautiful around here and the wood is of surpassing quality. Oh, you're leaving so soon? Ok then, stop by when you need more wood."

location.name: Snowman
location.description: This jolly frozen fellow can be found selling a supply of Poofy and regular Snowballs.

location.name: Archmage
location.description: An Archmage by a lifestone. If you find yourself far from time and need supplies, he may just be able to help you out in a pinch.

location.name: Coron Usgin
location.description:
Quest(s): Horn of Vigilance.
Coron Usgin tells you, "Hello harried traveler. Is thy residence threatened by Olthoi or other vermin? Then thou art in need of the Horn of Vigilance! I have been commissioned by the famed Isparian Researcher Telk the Addlepated to sell instructions for this device that he has spent decades developing. The merest breath of wind blowing through this instrument produces a sound which is not discernible by human ears, yet repels all manner of vermin! It also makes an exquisite decoration for any residence!"
Coron Usgin tells you, "Such a fine instrument could easily be sold for 999,999,999 Pyreals, however I will provide you with everything you need to craft it for a mere jar of Sunflower Oil! For one single jar of Sunflower Oil I will provide thee with a beautiful, leather bound, instruction book describing the easy to follow crafting steps for making the astounding Horn of Vigilance."
Coron Usgin tells you, "But hark! There is more!"
Coron Usgin tells you, "For no extra fee at all I will give thee an extremely useful carving knife which thou may use to craft this item! This knife alone has a thousand and one uses! It can carve arrowshafts, cut meat and chicken, chop cabbage, filet fish, slice mushrooms and carrots, cut bread and even carve a pumpkin! Is that not extraordinary?!"
Coron Usgin tells you, "Thus, I strongly urge thee to hurry, pick a Sunflower and bring it to Lilly of Glenden Wood. She will make thee some Sunflower Oil which thou should bring back to me. It is just that effortless! One may find Sunflowers in forested areas of North and South Osteth."
Coron Usgin tells you, "When you return I will tell you about other items required. Good hunting!"

location.name: Jordan's Apprentice Craftsman
location.description:
Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.
A furntiure vendor in Zaikhal.

location.name: Tian Li Quan
location.description:
Quest(s): Spear of the Given Heart.
This scribe in Lin had dealings with young Tamian Wilmot. Could he possibly know of his where abouts?

location.name: Maere the Dyepot Peddlar
location.description:
Quest(s): Shadow Armor. Sells at 1000%, buys at ??%.
From this vendor you can buy the dyes to color Greater Celdon Armor.
Red Shadow Dye - 100,000py Green Shadow Dye - 100,000py Blue Shadow Dye - 100,000py
Maere the Dyepot Peddlar tells you, "Choose your colors quickly now, I have a lot of customers right now and don't have all day."

location.name: Tackle Master (Shoushi)
location.description:
Quest(s): Fishing.
Tackle Master tells you, "Welcome back chum! Do you need a fishing license today? Just give me a C note and I'll get you all signed up and ready to fish."

location.name: Tackle Master (Holtburg)
location.description:
Quest(s): Fishing.
Tackle Master tells you, "Welcome back chum! Do you need a fishing license today? Just give me a C note and I'll get you all signed up and ready to fish."

location.name: Tackle Master (Rithwic)
location.description:
Quest(s): Fishing.
Tackle Master tells you, "Welcome back chum! Do you need a fishing license today? Just give me a C note and I'll get you all signed up and ready to fish."

location.name: Tackle Master (Yaraq)
location.description:
Quest(s): Fishing.
Tackle Master tells you, "Welcome back chum! Do you need a fishing license today? Just give me a C note and I'll get you all signed up and ready to fish."

location.name: Tackle Master (Cragstone)
location.description:
Quest(s): Fishing.
Tackle Master tells you, "Welcome back chum! Do you need a fishing license today? Just give me a C note and I'll get you all signed up and ready to fish."

location.name: Ro Bi-Jor, Apprentice Tailor
location.description:
Quest(s): Heart of Innocence, Oswald's Dirk.
Ro Bi-Jor, Apprentice Tailor tells you, "Hello I am an apprentice of To-ping Ra. He is teaching me the venerable art of tailoring. I have seen a few setbacks in my studies recently but I am sure that my confidence will return."
Hand her Letter to Ro Bi-Jor and receive 250.000 xp. Since the letter can be given, nice starter xp.

location.name: Blacksmith
location.description:
A blacksmith in the middle of the Dires.
Discovered by Circeus.

location.name: Snowman
location.description:
Sells: A Frozen Note, 100 Snowballs, 100 Poofy Snowballs.
Submitted by Zen Tek Ken.

location.name: Roaming Bowyer
location.description: The roaming Bowyer who lives at the Farmstead.

location.name: Novedion the Gem Seller (Holtburg)
location.description:
Quest(s): Arm, Mind, and Heart.
Novedion the Gem Seller tells you, "Greetings. I and my two brothers have been sent to some of the Isparian Arrival points to offer our fine wares. While many Isparians have only dealt with our less refined cousins, the Tukal smiths are masters of many arts. These particular gems have been crafted by some of our finest master gem crafters and imbued with helpful magics which I am sure will be useful to the Isparian adventurer. I also am selling Benevolent Calm, a necessary ingredient to fashion the Staff of Clarity."
Sells some special magical gems that will protect you while you're young. And a potion that is part of the Lugian Arm, Heart, and Mind quest.

location.name: Barkeep Jubal al-Baljad
location.description:
Barkeep Jubal al-Baljad tells you, Welcome to the Cerulean Cove! Are you thirsty, friend traveler?
Barkeep Jubal al-Baljad tells you, It seems like every other day, some grizzled adventurer comes around asking about an old key in the tunnels to the south.

location.name: Archmage Zarri ibn Khaybi
location.description:
Quest(s): Portal Gems. Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Archmage Zarri ibn Khaybi tells you, Welcome, fellow seeker.

location.name: Barkeep Anarn
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Barkeep Anarn tells you, Oy.
Barkeep Anarn tells you, Come back anytime, mate. I'll keep the taps flowing.

location.name: Zalphoos the Shopkeeper
location.description:
Zalphoos the Shopkeeper tells you, Welcome to my humble shop.
Zalphoos the Shopkeeper tells you, You drive a hard bargain, my friend.

location.name: Aderma the Lapidary
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Aderma the Lapidary tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"
Aderma the Lapidary tells you, "You drive a hard bargain, my friend."
Aderma the Lapidary tells you, "Thank you for your business. Please return soon."

location.name: Adraha bint Safsan the Appraiser
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Afsan ibn Kusain the Barkeep
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
My bar was almost at the center of the crater. Everything I owned was destroyed.

location.name: Ai Konaji the Jeweler
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Ai Konaji the Jeweler tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"

location.name: Aldera Brunall Weaponsmith
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Almina bint Atwab the Weaponsmith
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Archmage (Sawato)
location.description: Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Archmage (Hebian-To)
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Archmage tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"
Archmage tells you, "An excellent purchase."
Archmage tells you, "You drive a hard bargain, my friend."
Archmage tells you, "Thank you for your business. Please return soon."

location.name: Archmage Anyao Zai
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Archmage Asaina al-Arqis
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Archmage Bendrew Efrith
location.description:
Buys at 80%, sells at 170%.
Archmage Bendrew Efrith tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"
Archmage Bendrew Efrith tells you, "Thank you for your business. Please return soon."

location.name: Archmage Chen Wah-Ji
location.description: Buys at 95%, sells at 125%.

location.name: Archmage Cindrue
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 135%.

location.name: Archmage Cortorl
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
...

location.name: Archmage Dakila bint Ma`liz
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Archmage Den Ou
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Archmage Den Ou tells you, "Welcome to my shop."

location.name: Archmage Dou Ran
location.description:
Buys at 70%, sells at 190%.
Archmage Dou Ran tells you, "Isolation can lead to insight or madness. Thank you for coming by."
Archmage Dou Ran tells you, "I was able to learn the secret of Lifestone Recall while adventuring in a nearby maze. I believe the maze contains other secrets, as well."
Archmage Dou Ran tells you, "Let detachment guard you. Without detachment you will be unable to let go and move forward."
Archmage Dou Ran tells you, "Let discipline hone you. Without discipline you will tire and fall away."
Archmage Dou Ran tells you, "Joy can be found in the worst of situations. Please come by our shop again."

location.name: Archmage Geltruma
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
...

location.name: Archmage Inyamkaya bint Ruz
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Archmage Jiz ibn Ijfai
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Archmage Jo Ji-Shen
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Archmage Kiko of Kara
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Archmage Nulsymber
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Archmage Philomon
location.description:
Buys at 80%, sells at 170%.
Archmage Philomon tells you, "Yes, what is it?"
Archmage Philomon tells you, "Come again to my little corner of the castle."

location.name: Archmage Sammam al-Ashiz
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Archmage Shikiru Nohon
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Archmage Ta Ban-Yu
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Archmage Tawa Matema
location.description: Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Archmage Yuzai Zhen
location.description: Sell at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Arina of the Arms
location.description: Within Underground City.

location.name: Arlad ibn Mulud the Tailor
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Armorer Hinfiya bint Ju
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Armorer Padira Yukinara
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Armorer Talam ibn Tarish
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Armorer Xao Fen
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Aun Dreganaua the Elder Shaman
location.description:
Sells At 170% Buys At 80%. Platinum Scarabs 68k.
Aun Dreganaua the Elder Shaman tells you, "When the Virindi first came to us, we sounded for the anima of their kind...and then we were filled with terror, for we found that they had none."
Aun Dreganaua the Elder Shaman tells you, "The Hea will never be permitted back in Timaru so long as they persist in their dealings with atua ngamaru!"

location.name: Aun Laranawa the Barkeep
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Aun Maanuawa the Armorer
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Aun Maanuawa the Armorer tells you, "This town has not been this busy since the Hea left to follow that outcast, Aranpuh."
Aun Maanuawa the Armorer tells you, "Do not trust anyone...or anything...that you meet once you venture outside our lands."
Aun Maanuawa grins cheerfully.
Aun Maanuawa the Armorer tells you, "Back again? Seems like you just left!"

location.name: Aun Ngaiona the Jeweler
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Aun Ngaiona the Jeweler tells you, "You will never be able to find ornaments as fine as these in Ahurenga--that town of outcasts and thieves!"
Aun Ngaiona the Jeweler tells you, "Please come again--I will have many more items in the future."

location.name: Aun Paikitea the Bowyer
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Aun Paikitea the Bowyer tells you, "I'm glad the Hea are no longer among us--I couldn't stand to be in their tainted presence ever again. Tailless abominations! Just look at their boy-tah. His traffic with the atua ngamaru left him quite mad, you know."
Aun Paikitea the Bowyer tells you, "Be sure not to cooperate with the Hea...or you may find our gates will be closed to you as well."

location.name: Aun Taguauri the Healer
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Aun Taguauri the Healer tells you, "Yet another in need of my help! Will Wharu's invasions never cease?"
Aun Taguauri the Healer tells you, "Take care as you venture into the wilds--there will be no one to protect you outside our drum circle."

location.name: Avorgild the Shopkeeper
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Avorgild the Shopkeeper tells you, "I'm surprised you made it up here. We enjoy our isolation."

location.name: Bai-Nu Ru the Weaponsmith
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Barkeep Bai Yao Feng
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Barkeep Brita the Boisterous
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Barkeep Gorth
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Barkeep Mausin ibn Hi
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Barkeep Mordmor
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Barkeep Mordmor tells you, "Oi, mate! The Tumerok siege has grown fiercer recently! Our food supplies are dwindling. I'll give ye a good price for any food ye might have. Thankfully we've still got booze!"
Barkeep Mordmor tells you, "I hope you found what you needed, our stocks have become depleted."

location.name: Barkeep Ricetha
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Barkeeper Chon Nuo
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Barkeeper Wilomine
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Barkeeper Wilomine tells you, "Welcome to the Helm and Shield! What's your pleasure today?"

location.name: Barshid al-Juhir the Scribe
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Bashkiya the Scribe
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Belbeca the Archmage
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Belbeca the Weaponsmith tells you, "Hello and welcome."
Belbeca the Weaponsmith tells you, "May you have a fine and glorious day."

location.name: Berkholt the Burly Barkeep
location.description: Sells at 190%, buys at 70%.

location.name: Blacksmith Magarith
location.description:
Sells at 180%, buys at 80%.
Blacksmith Magarith tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"
Blacksmith Magarith tells you, "You drive a hard bargain, my friend."
Blacksmith Magarith tells you, "Thank you. Be careful in your travels, and please do come back."

location.name: Blacksmith Ton Wing
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Bowyer Hanra ibn Zarib
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Bowyer Jyi Zhente
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Bowyer Shurida bint Zaud
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Brenica the Jeweler
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Brenica the Jeweler tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"

location.name: Brisin the Healer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Brother Gonun the Scribe
location.description: Buys at 95%, sells at 125%.

location.name: Brother Jarviso
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Brother Jarviso tells you, "Welcome to Neydisa Castle, traveler."
Brother Jarviso tells you, "Thank you."
Brother Jarviso tells you, "May peace go with you in your travels."

location.name: Brother Ku-Xao Sutan the Monk
location.description:
Brother Ku-Xao Sutan the Monk tells you, Good day. Be quick, I can hear the guards just outside.
Brother Ku-Xao Sutan the Monk tells you, Thank you. Did you hear about Brother Klars in Redspire?
Brother Ku-Xao Sutan the Monk tells you, I wouldn't normally take one of these, but I'm taking no chances.
Brother Ku-Xao Sutan the Monk tells you, I'll be here the next time you come by. Hopefully.

location.name: Brother Samir ibn Lomaq the Monk
location.description:
Brother Samir ibn Lomaq the Monk tells you, Good day, traveler. Do you need any help? Have Varicci's men harmed you?
Brother Samir ibn Lomaq the Monk tells you, I had such grand plans for my shop, and now the Viamontians have come and ruined it all.
Brother Samir ibn Lomaq the Monk tells you, Thank you. I thought we would all do well out here on the frontier... I guess I was wrong.
Brother Samir ibn Lomaq the Monk tells you, If you see my brother Yusnar in Bluespire, tell him that I am well.

location.name: Bu-Chi Long the Armorer
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Bukai Fu-ya the Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Buray ibn Tamsa the Blacksmith
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Caranis the Dependable
location.description:
Quest(s): Bestowers Guild of Dereth, Gold Hill Ruins.
Caranis the Dependable tells you, "Have you come for instructions or for puzzle pieces? I can sell you either..."

location.name: Cemcera the Shopkeeper
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Cemcera the Shopkeeper tells you, "Thank you."

location.name: Chueh Kaigin the Jeweler
location.description: Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Claude the Archmage
location.description:
Sells at 190%, buys at 70%.
Claude the Archmage tells you, "Welcome to my shop. My name is Claude. How are you today?"
Claude the Archmage tells you, "Please, enjoy my one hundred and four items for purchase. I cast dispels in exchange for metals or promissory notes. My one hundred and fourth item is a rumor about the Obsidian Plains."
Claude the Archmage tells you, "Thank you for purchasing my wares. I appreciate your patronage."
Claude the Archmage tells you, "Return soon. Have a nice day."

location.name: Cynsela the Tailor
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Cynsela the Tailor tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"
Cynsela the Tailor tells you, "An excellent purchase."
Cynsela the Tailor tells you, "Thank you for your business. Please return soon."

location.name: Da'hir ibn Khayzur the Archmage
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Dafrida the Tailor
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Dafrida the Tailor tells you, "Welcome to Lythelthorpe."
Dafrida the Tailor tells you, "Welcome to my shop!"
Dafrida the Tailor tells you, "It's a pleasure doing business with you."
Dafrida the Tailor tells you, "A fine choice."
Dafrida the Tailor tells you, "Thanks for coming by."

location.name: Danifa Gondmad the Healer
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Danifa Gondmad the Healer tells you, "I'm not going back to my house until I can lock my doors again. I'm letting the Captains of the Royal Guard use my shop as a base of operations until then."

location.name: Denki Sokuto the Scribe
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Djusufa bint Huqis the Jeweler
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Djuyat ibn Fisa the Armorer
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Dorlan the Armorer
location.description:
Dorlan the Armorer tells you, I hope Ton Ai Yen in Redspire is all right.
Dorlan the Armorer tells you, They took Baggs! Dragged him right out of his tent! I could be next!
Dorlan the Armorer tells you, I hope Ton Ai Yen in Redspire is all right.
Dorlan the Armorer tells you, We were competitors, yes, but we were also friends. I hope he's all right.

location.name: Dortold the Tailor
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Dortold the Tailor tells you, "Welcome. What can Dortold do for you?"
Dortold the Tailor tells you, "Dortold thanks you for your business."
Dortold the Tailor tells you, "Dortold thinks you have made a wise purchase. Dortold is happy."
Dortold the Tailor tells you, "Dortold likes what he has bought."

location.name: Drawohan the Gem Seller
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Ecutha the Tailor
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Ecutha the Tailor tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"
Ecutha the Tailor tells you, "You drive a hard bargain, my friend."
Ecutha the Tailor tells you, "Thank you for your business. Please return soon.".

location.name: Eldrista the Adventurer
location.description:
Quest(s): Liltha's Lost Bow.
Eldrista the Adventurer tells you, "No more scrabbling in dungeons for me! If you want some of Lilitha's dirty old arrows, you can go get them yourself!"
Eldrista the Adventurer tells you, "What? You want the story? Well, just west of here is a dungeon called Hunter's Leap. You'll find it around 35.7N, 32.6E. Legend has it that the great hunter Lilitha lived there when she was younger, while she practiced her skills."
Eldrista the Adventurer tells you, "I never met her myself, but I have a lot of respect for someone with that kind of spirit. Anyway, when she moved out, she left behind a lot of the bows and arrows she had made -- substandard work, stuff she wasn't happy with. But it's still better than what most of these so-called archers can make today."
Eldrista the Adventurer tells you, "I made my living for a long time by collecting the arrows she left behind and selling them. But then the banderlings moved out and a new bunch moved in and my Farmer left and ... I just don't think I want to do that anymore."
Eldrista the Adventurer tells you, "But ... if you find one of her old bows, bring it to me and I'll see what I can do for a reward."

location.name: Ellimar Jorning the Healer
location.description: Sells at 190%, buys at 70%.

location.name: Elthina the Shady
location.description: Within Arwic Mines.

location.name: Erludd the Cur the Barkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Esteca the Bowyer
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Esteca the Bowyer tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"

location.name: Fadsahil al-Tashbi the Master Archmage
location.description:
Sells at 110%, buys at 80%. Platinum Scarabs 44,000py.
Fadsahil al-Tashbi the Master Archmage tells you, "How may I help thee, traveler?"
Fadsahil al-Tashbi the Master Archmage tells you, "An excellent purchase, friend."
Fadsahil al-Tashbi the Master Archmage tells you, "Another fine component!"
Fadsahil al-Tashbi the Master Archmage tells you, "May the wind be always at your back, traveler!"

location.name: Farmer (Lin)
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Farmer
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Farmer Khurah al-Rujarkir

location.name: Fertroth the Healer
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Fertroth the Healer tells you, "Welcome. I have better prices than in Glenden Wood proper!"
Fertroth the Healer tells you, "Thank you, come again."

location.name: Fispur Ansel the Grocer
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%
Fispur Ansel the Grocer tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"

location.name: Fletcher Peldin Yewbender
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Fletcher Peldin Yewbender tells you, "Welcome to Peldin's Bows friend. I think I killed about fifty of those Eaters when they were still attacking the town. They don't seem to enjoy pointy things being launched into their gapping maws. Do you need any missile weapons?"
Fletcher Peldin Yewbender tells you, "Did you hear the horrible news about Antius? He was a man I would have followed into battle. I can't believe that traitor Kurth was able to kill him. Fear of death, a real and final death, is something we haven't worried about for a long time."

location.name: Fyrdina Ellic the Weaponsmith
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Fyrdina Ellic the Weaponsmith tells you, "I'm selling armor and weapons while Londigul helps Miss Genza and the Captains of the Royal Guard organize the militia. What do you need?"

location.name: Gailadu the Scribe
location.description: Within Underground City.

location.name: Geldeb Finol the Weaponsmith
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
- Tom U.

location.name: Gharuya al-Dhul the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Girdweld the Shopkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Goro Yu-Ban the Provisioner
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Grethoric of all Trades
location.description: Within Underground City.

location.name: Greygor Stillwise the Armorer
location.description:
Greygor Stillwise the Armorer tells you, Greetings. Have you come to help us against the invaders?
Greygor Stillwise the Armorer tells you, Use it against Varicci's men!
Greygor Stillwise the Armorer tells you, I can always use more to restock my shelves -- it's so hard to get shipments in these days.
Greygor Stillwise the Armorer tells you, I'd recommend visiting Anh while you're up here, you can never be too careful.

location.name: Grocer Cortarn
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%. White Sacks.
Grocer Cortarn tells you, "Welcome to my shop!" Grocer Cortarn tells you, "Thank you for your patronage."

location.name: Grocer Nan-Yu-Yenbuto
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Grocer Nihara bint Umar
location.description: Sells at 190%, buys at 70%.

location.name: Grocer Pon Hau-jo
location.description: Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Grocer Riku Ryu
location.description: Sell at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Grocer Sina bint Idnun
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Grocer Tashhir ibn Najrak
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Gylfolma the Scribe
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Gylfolma the Scribe tells you, "Welcome. I'm glad to see someone interested in my scholary works."
Gylfolma the Scribe tells you, "I cannot see why anyone would be out there in the dangerous lands, but take care anyway."

location.name: Hau Ji Tan the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%

location.name: Hea Camauri the Barkeep
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Hea Kiriona the Shopkeep
location.description:
Sells at 155% buys at 90%. White Containers.
Hea Kiriona the Shopkeep tells you, "The strife in the south causes less trade. This is bad for both our peoples."
Hea Kiriona the Shopkeep tells you, "Please come again. I am particularly interested in Viamontian items."

location.name: Hea Nyrenauri the Healer
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Hea Nyrenauri the Healer tells you, "The Virindi have only our best interests in mind--if you engaged their friendship, you might benefit as well."
Hea Nyrenauri the Healer tells you, "Be careful as you adventure here--the Aun are not to be trusted. I would not be surprised if they tried to drag you into their hopeless crusade."

location.name: Hea Nyrinua the Armorer
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Hea Nyrinua the Armorer tells you, "Is it true that there are many wondrous sights to see on the land across the water?"
Hea Nyrinua the Armorer tells you, "I would not bother traveling up to the highlands if I were you--it is dangerous there and populated only by timid, unimaginative folk. I've even heard that bukha Aun Ralirea has been spotted stalking the Ebon Gromnies among the plateau's peaks. Every year he stocks his lodge, expecting company...Aun just don't know when to let go."

location.name: Hea Palagura the Jeweler
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Hea Palagura the Jeweler tells you, "I am so tired with Wharu's invasions and the Aun's sordid preoccupation with them! I'll bide my time here, then I'm off to join my brothers in Samsur." Hea Palagura the Jeweler tells you, "Don't take any wooden pyreals--I could name other xutas who aren't as honest as we are here in Ahurenga."

location.name: Hea Timitea the Bowyer
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.
Hea Timitea the Bowyer tells you, "I don't know why my xuta brethren say I'm not ready to leave for the mainland yet. I've followed the rules in our pact with the Virindi!" Hea Timitea the Bowyer tells you, "Next time we meet will be on the mainland, I'm sure!"

location.name: Healer Beysta
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Healer Beysta tells you, "Welcome to my store!"
Healer Beysta tells you, "You must be careful out there. Make sure you take plenty of healing supplies with you."

location.name: Healer Burah bint Fathlan
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Healer Fan Lun-Kou
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Healer Fridroth
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Healer Fridroth tells you, "What do you want?"
Healer Fridroth tells you, "Thanks. I hope you settle down in a safe place so you won't have to come back."

location.name: Healer Hisuf ibn Shudir
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Healer Jilrisi ibn Makhur
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Healer Kai Kou
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Healer Kai Tonweh
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Healer Kai Tonweh tells you, "The foul Gaerlan lies caged in his phylactery and Yanshi is reborn! I can assist with any health needs you may have."

location.name: Healer Kana of Kara
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Healer Rili Sou
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Healer Sanami Siohiro
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Healer Sunwi
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Healer Tonsho Ha
location.description: Sell at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Healer Xidan Fensen
location.description: Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Helford Beldryn the Grocer
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Helford Beldryn the Grocer tells you, "Our food supplies are desperately low. I'll pay well for any food you can bring in."
Helford Beldryn the Grocer tells you, "Remember, bring back any food you can! Our town depends on it!"

location.name: Henrid the Grocer
location.description: Within Underground City.

location.name: Hinnabqiq the Jeweler
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Hiruhi Fensen the Scribe
location.description: Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Hon Fo the Shopkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Hudriffa the Shopkeeper
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Hudriffa the Shopkeeper tells you, "Welcome to the South Holtburg supply store!"
Hudriffa the Shopkeeper tells you, "Thank you. If you're new here, go through the Training Academy, and then go to Holtburg, to the north."

location.name: Hunderth the Provisioner
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Hunderth the Provisioner tells you, "We were lucky. We could have lost a lot more people than we did. Those poor Scriveners. I'll never forgive the Viamonts for this."

location.name: Hydeatha the Shopkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Ichi Ji
location.description: Ichi Ji tells you, "I've never had a customer that didn't live down here with us before. This has been an odd time. Now you people are crawling all over the place. There's nothing to see here."

location.name: Idenne Sulmad the Seamstress
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Idenne Sulmad the Seamstress tells you, "The Artisan's put up another tent where their old one was. They are surprisingly resilient for people who choose not to fight."
Idenne Sulmad the Seamstress tells you, "I helped the Artisan's make a new tent to replace the one they lost. They don't seem to harbor any anger against the Viamonts for what they have done. I respect their peaceful ideals, but I personally want some payback for Glenden Wood and Antius."

location.name: Iquba al-Julmud the Barkeeper
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Ite Kenzen the Barkeeper
location.description: Sells at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Jaikite Sanzen the Barkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Jasin of the Arcanum
location.description: This vendor resides inside the dungeon Hollow Lair near Lytelthorpe.

location.name: Jesren the Jolly Barkeep
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Jesren the Jolly Barkeep tells you, "I hope you enjoys your time in our hold. Just don't be preachin' about Pwyll or Jojii and we'll get on fine."
Jesren the Jolly Barkeep tells you, "Yeah, good on you with that."
Jesren the Jolly Barkeep tells you, "Sure, I can buy that."
Jesren the Jolly Barkeep tells you, "Hope to see you around again, mate."

location.name: Jeweler Daryam ibn Zubed
location.description: Sells at 190%, buys at 70%.

location.name: Jeweler Fathlan ibn Nuril
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Jeweler Imad Nedjim
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Jeweler Jurraf al-Djiqidh
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Jeweler Liman Pon
location.description: Sell at 155%, buy at 90%.

location.name: Jeweler Lo Dai-Ou
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Jeweler Ryuhan Wu
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Jhen Gau the Souvenir Hawker
location.description:
Sells At 190%.
Jhen Gau the Souvenir Hawker tells you, "Greetings, greetings! It is my honor to meet a fellow traveler in this distant land. Could I interest you in a memento, for the kids back in Dereth?"
Jhen Gau the Souvenir Hawker tells you, "Please tell your peers about me. No doubt they also have eager young journeymen under their tutelage, eager for spoils from this island. Surely, one of my shirts would be the most unique and memorable twink... er, souvenir!
Aerlinthe Patron Shirt (Inscribed: My patron went to Aerlinthe, and all I got was this lousy shirt.) Aerlinthe Monarch Shirt (Inscription: My monarch went to Aerlinthe, and all I got was this lousy shirt.)
Chicken (Use this item to eat it. Restores 10 Stamina when consumed.)
Image submitted by Kyn. Thanks!

location.name: Ji Tenxien the Tailor
location.description:
Quest(s): Spear of the Given Heart Quest. Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Ji Tenxien the Tailor tells you, "Welcome! What can I put on you today?
Ji Tenxien the Tailor tells you, "I guarantee you'll be the talk of the town with that new thing!"
Ji Tenxien the Tailor tells you, "Thank you for stopping by!"
Ji Tenxien the Tailor tells you, "I'll probably make a new pair of trousers with that ..."
Ji Tenxien the Tailor tells you, "If it ever gets a tear, come back and I'll fix it!"
Ji Tenxien the Tailor tells you, "Such a wonderful material! Thank you."
Ji Tenxien the Tailor tells you, "When they ask where you got such well-tailored clothes, please mention me!"

location.name: Jizal al-Nurla the Scribe
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Jo Gau the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Jumzik al-Budim the Archmage
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Ka Ku-To the Tailor
location.description:
Quest(s): Undead Mechanic. Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Ka Ku-To the Tailor tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"
Ka Ku-To the Tailor tells you, "The view from a great height can bring wisdom and awe, or just vertigo." Ka Ku-To the Tailor tells you, "I just enjoying watching the windmills endlessly turn on a windy day."
Ka Ku-To the Tailor tells you, "Looking within is sometimes harder than the most difficult dungeon."
Also sells the Inner Dungeon Key for the Undead Mechanic quest.

location.name: Kai Go-Sou the Scribe
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Kamira Mohonoko the Provisioner
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Kan Chi Gai the Healer
location.description:
Sells at 190%, buys at 70%.
Kan Chi Gai the Healer tells you, "Welcome, I provide a simple service to those in need of healing."
Kan Chi Gai the Healer tells you, "Be careful out there, especially of the Virindi."

location.name: Kasin ibn Sayrak the Barkeep
location.description:
Kasin ibn Sayrak the Barkeep tells you, Please, come in and rest. It's been so difficult since Varicci's men took over.
Kasin ibn Sayrak the Barkeep tells you, Many thanks.
Kasin ibn Sayrak the Barkeep tells you, These days, I'll stock any supplies I can get.
Kasin ibn Sayrak the Barkeep tells you, Have you any word from Redspire? My friend Bachus lives there and I've not heard from her since the invasion.

location.name: Kaza Nijina the Archmage
location.description:
Buys at 80%, sells at 170%.
Kaza Nijina the Archmage tells you, "Welcome to MacNiall's Freehold, outsider. We have almost anything you could want... at a price."
Kaza Nijina the Archmage tells you, "Go in freedom."

location.name: Kento Do the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Kiun Baicho the Barkeeper
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Koro of Kara, Farmer
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Kouxao Ei the Healer
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Kuyalal al-A'ma the Jeweler
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Ladim al-Faji the Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Lai Jhong the Archmage
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Lai Konsho the Armorsmith
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Lalid al-Jasi the Jeweler
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Lam Yi the Jeweler
location.description:
Lam Yi the Jeweler tells you, My beautiful jewels mean nothing to me, now that Klars is gone.
Lam Yi the Jeweler tells you, It's guaranteed to shine until Varicci's men drag me away. Yes, I know that's not funny, it's not a joke.
Lam Yi the Jeweler tells you, Yes, fine. Do you think that he's all right?
Lam Yi the Jeweler tells you, Please, try to find Klars? I miss him so.

location.name: Landeth Colson the Jeweler
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Landeth Colson the Jeweler tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"
Landeth Colson the Jeweler tells you, "Thank you for your business. Please return soon."

location.name: Lark Grifanna the Barkeep
location.description:
Lark Grifanna the Barkeep tells you, Here I was, listening to Bachus' tales of a Tumerok feud, with no idea that I'd find myself in the middle of an Isparian war!
Lark Grifanna the Barkeep tells you, Whether you need refuge or information, I can probably help you.
Lark Grifanna the Barkeep tells you, Oh, thank you, I was almost out of these.
Lark Grifanna the Barkeep tells you, I used to say we were living in interesting times. What did I know? These, these are truly interesting times.

location.name: Le Ben the Healer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Leyrale Shalorn the Tailor
location.description:
Leyrale Shalorn the Tailor tells you, At first, I was just happy to see new people, believe it or not.
Leyrale Shalorn the Tailor tells you, Are you sure you don't need more?
Leyrale Shalorn the Tailor tells you, I should have known... new friends don't arrive in the dead of night with drawn blades.
Leyrale Shalorn the Tailor tells you, Take care, adventurer. Tell my friends in Ayan Baqur that I am safe, for now.

location.name: Lich Archmage
location.description: Like the Master Mages, Platinum Scarabs 44,000py.

location.name: Lin Hanza the Bowyer
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Lin Hanza the Bowyer tells you, "Your bow is your best friend when traveling these dangerous islands. What do you need?" Lin Hanza the Bowyer tells you, "Strike down one of those filthy Mosswarts, if you can."

location.name: Lisatha the Bowyer
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Lisatha the Bowyer tells you, "I sell and buy bows and arrows. Are you interested?"
Lisatha the Bowyer tells you, "This castle must surely have seen more pleasant days, long ago."

location.name: Lo Ma the Jeweler
location.description: Buys at 90%, sells at 155%.

location.name: Lobu Shui the Armorer
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Londigul Ellic the Armorer
location.description:
Quest(s): Glenden Wood Invaders.
Londigul Ellic the Armorer tells you, "We've driven the Viamontians out of town and back to where they have their blockades setup. Travel down any of the roads leading out of town to find the blockades and kill the invaders you find in that area. If you can kill twenty of the invaders I'll make you a member of the Glenden Wood Militia. Once you've proven you can fight we have more that you may be able to help us with."

location.name: Ludora the Healer
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Ludora the Healer tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"
Ludora the Healer tells you, "Thank you for your business. Please return soon."

location.name: Luthin the Smith
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Maftaltub al-Sur the Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Magus Ku Min
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Maqura al-Waryah the Blacksmith
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Maryata bint Daris the Barkeep
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Melia Thorn the Archmage
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Melia Thorn the Archmage tells you, "Hmph. An outsider. Well, as long as you're here, you might as well make yourself useful. So buy something or talk to our captains. They'll give you something to do."
Melia Thorn the Archmage tells you, "Stay out of trouble."

location.name: Merchant
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Mi Chi the Barkeep
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Micon Stuvis the Barkeep
location.description:
Micon Stuvis the Barkeep tells you, Say what you will about the invaders, but they do have fascinating tales to tell.
Micon Stuvis the Barkeep tells you, All are welcome at the Siraluun's Wing, even Viamontians... as long as they can pay.
Micon Stuvis the Barkeep tells you, If you're sure you don't need this...
Micon Stuvis the Barkeep tells you, It's ironic... I advised Bachus to move here for her safety, and then this happened.

location.name: Milanna Russmad the Mage
location.description:
Milanna Russmad the Mage tells you, Greetings, traveler, it is good to see you. These invaders have been driving away my business.
Milanna Russmad the Mage tells you, Don't let those go to waste. Who knows when I'll be able to get more?
Milanna Russmad the Mage tells you, I can always use one of those.
Milanna Russmad the Mage tells you, Be sure to see Micon while you're here. And if you can, try to comfort poor Lam Yi.

location.name: Misha the Jeweler
location.description:
Misha the Jeweler tells you, I have so many beautiful things here... please, buy them before Varicci's men come and steal them!
Misha the Jeweler tells you, Conceal that under your armor if you expect to get it out of town!
Misha the Jeweler tells you, Lovely. Let me see where I can hide this.
Misha the Jeweler tells you, Come again soon, while I still have inventory to sell.

location.name: Mishiya al-Abdi the Barkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Miya bint Atwab the Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Monyra the Jeweler
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Mothdor the Bowyer
location.description:
Sells at 180%, buys at 80%.
Mothdor the Bowyer tells you, "Thanks for your patronage. Every little bit helps!"
Mothdor the Bowyer tells you, "An excellent purchase."
Mothdor the Bowyer tells you, "Good luck in your travels in this forsaken land!"

location.name: Muda bint Qalakh the Tailor
location.description: Sells at 145%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Mulud al-Iyar the Healer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Muoyen Han the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Muta al-Mai the Bowyer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Najsuf al-Afan the Shopkeeper
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Nashima al-Haruq the Healer
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Nasruya al-Khanjan the Tailor
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Natalie the Scribe
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Nathious Agoren the Jeweler
location.description:
Nathious Agoren the Jeweler tells you, How may I help you, adventurer? Are you come to help us?
Nathious Agoren the Jeweler tells you, I sell only the finest quality. You can trust me -- I'm not Viamontian.
Nathious Agoren the Jeweler tells you, Thank you for choosing my humble shop to sell your wares.
Nathious Agoren the Jeweler tells you, Please come again... and please, help us.

location.name: Nelvaine the Brewer
location.description:
Quest(s): Feud of Neydisa and Bandit Castle, Buadren, Invoker.
Nelvaine the Brewer tells you, "Come to sample my famous brews, have you? Seneschal Gormling, in particular, is fond of my Olde Ispar Stout. Unfortunately it goes straight to his head, lightweight that he is."
Nelvaine the Brewer tells you, "Cheers!"

location.name: Nen Gou the Shopkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Nun Hong the Jeweler
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 80%.

location.name: Nuru Misho the Jeweler
location.description: Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Nuya bint Mulud the Grocer
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Oi Ra the Shopkeeper
location.description: Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.

location.name: Old Wylfed the Scribe
location.description:
Sells at 170%, buys at 80%.
Old Wylfed the Scribe tells you, "Welcome! What's your pleasure today?"

location.name: Ortun Trell the Jeweler
location.description:
Sells at 155%, buys at 90%.
Ortun Trell the Jeweler tells you, "I hear that the Captains in Danifa's shop brought some interesting information to Tomo Genza."
Ortun Trell the Jeweler tells you, "The death of Antius has saddened and worried everyone. If Varicci's mages can create weapons that really kill us we are in serious trouble."

location.name: Ostentatious Farmer
location.description:
Quest(s): Elysa's Favor.
Before Entering the Trap Door
Ostentatious Farmer tells you, "Welcome to my grand opening! You are welcome to peruse my wares...but please, stay to the front of my shop--the heat from the fire is very strong, and I don't want you to get burned."
Ostentatious Farmer tells you, "Thank you for your patronage. Now please be on your way, I have much work to do."
After Entering the Trap Door
Ostentatious Farmer tells you, "How dare you nose around my house, when I expressely asked you not to? Ok, you can buy something, but after that, get out, GET OUT!"
Ostentatious Farmer tells you, "Like I said, LEAVE! GO! OUT! NOW!"

location.name: Peddler (Rithwic)
location.description:
Sells at 135%, buys at 90%.
Crumpled Note on the floor.
As long as I am writing you, I will answer your question about the distant Carved Cave.
Start at Zaikhal, the proud capitol of the Gharu nation, and journey south for some distance. You will come to a great range of hills -- I can scarce call it mountains, though some flatlanders might. Here, in a low-roofed crevice, you will find the entrance to the Cave. Remember that you must have the other six keys before you venture through!
If you need more explicit directions, send a message to me and I will try to be more clear.
-- Tibri the Cavedweller, to Iquba al-Julmud.

Ton Ai Yen the Armorer tells you, We were all rivals, we armorers, but we respected each other. It makes me sick to wonder where they've taken him.
Ton Ai Yen the Armorer tells you, Remember us, friend.

Ximi Nu the Blacksmith tells you, "My greatest wish is to craft the very best armors to protect those who devote their lives protecting others."
Ximi Nu the Blacksmith tells you, "Let compassion be in your every thought and action, as you strive to help others in their paths."
Ximi Nu the Blacksmith tells you, "Blessings in your travels."
Ximi Nu the Blacksmith tells you, "Let humility dwell within you. Without humility you will be easily misled and lose your way."

Yen Loc Anh the Mage tells you, Be sure you have all you need. Who knows when Varicci's men will drag me away.
Yen Loc Anh the Mage tells you, Thank you.
Yen Loc Anh the Mage tells you, Keep your eyes open. This island is even more dangerous, now that the invaders have arrived.

Ystig Marson the Barkeeper tells you, "We finally cleaned up everything from the mess those Eaters made. They were true to their name too. I had to send runners to replace everything they ate, it cost me a fortune!"

location.description:
Yusnar ibn Lomaq the Grocer tells you, Welcome, friend. Even in these days, my prices are unbeatable.
Yusnar ibn Lomaq the Grocer tells you, Thank you. I've got more, hidden away where the invaders can't find it.
Yusnar ibn Lomaq the Grocer tells you, I'll buy at that price from you, but don't tell Varicci's men.
Yusnar ibn Lomaq the Grocer tells you, Come back soon. These are trying times, but a man still needs to make a living.

Zisaha bint Jaidka the Mage tells you, "Fare well. Travel at your own risk

location.name: Pawn Shopkeep (Yaraq)
